Interface IUserRepository

Interface for UserRepository, defining methods for user management operations.

Namespace: MagicQuizDesktop.Models
Assembly: MagicQuizDesktop.dll
Syntax
public interface IUserRepository

Methods

AuthenticateUser(String, String)

Authenticates a user with specified username and password.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<LoginUser>> AuthenticateUser(string username, string password)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String username

The username of the user to authenticate.
System.String password

The password of the user to authenticate.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<LoginUser>>

A task resulting in an ApiResponse containing the authenticated user.

GetByAll(String)

Asynchronously retrieves all users as a list.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<List<User>>> GetByAll(string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String authToken

The token to authorize the request.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<System.Collections.Generic.List<User>>>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains an API response that has a list of users.

GetById(Int32, String)

Asynchronously retrieves the User object associated with a specific ID, using a specified authentication token.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<User>> GetById(int id, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 id

The unique identifier of the user to retrieve.
System.String authToken

The authentication token used for the API request.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<User>>

A ApiResponse object containing the User associated with the given ID.

Inactivate(User, String)

Asynchronously inactivates the given user using the provided authorization token.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<User>> Inactivate(User user, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
User user

The user to be inactivated.
System.String authToken

The authorization token to use.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<User>>

A task representing the asynchronous operation. The result of the task is an instance of ApiResponse containing the user details.

Type Name Description

The authentication token tied to the user's session.

An ApiResponseWithNoData instance representing the result of the logout operation.

UpdateUser(User, String)

Updates the specified user using the provided auth token. Returns the server response containing the updated user data.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<User>> UpdateUser(User user, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
User user

The user to update.
System.String authToken

The auth token for authenticating the update operation.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<User>>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the API response including the updated user data.
